paramInformation.label: Button 1 And 3 Pair Mode
paramInformation.description: In separate mode button 1 works with group a, button 3 with groups c. click is on, hold is dimming up, double click is off, click-hold is dimming down. in pair button 1/3 are up/down correspondingly. click is on/off, hold is dimming up/down. single clicks works with group a, double click with group c

paramInformation.label: Button 2 And 4 Pair Mode
paramInformation.description: In separate mode button 2 works with control group b, button 4 with control group d. click is on, hold is dimming up, double click is off, click-hold is dimming down. in pair button b/d are up/down correspondingly. click is on/off, hold is dimming up/down. single clicks works with group b, double click with group d

paramInformation.label: Command to Control Group A
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines the command to be sent to devices of control group a when the related button is pressed

options.label: Switch on/off and dim (send Basic Set and switch multilevel)

paramInformation.description: This parameter defines the command to be sent to devices of control group b when the related button is pressed

options.label: Switch on/off and dim (send Basic Set and switch multilevel)

paramInformation.description: This parameter defines the command to be sent to devices of control group c when the related button is pressed

options.label: Switch on/off and dim (send Basic Set and switch multilevel)

paramInformation.label: Command to Control Group D
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines the command to be sent to devices of control group d when the related button is pressed

options.label: Switch on/off and dim (send Basic Set and switch multilevel)

paramInformation.label: Send The Following Switch All Commands
Blocks Wakeup Even When Wakeup Interval is Set
Send Unsolicited Battery Report On Wake Up

options.label: To same node as wake up notification

metadata.inclusion: Place your primary controller in inclusion mode by following the manufacturer's instructions, then activate inclusion on the wall controller by pressing any one of the four buttons for one second. Inclusion mode is indicated by the red/green blinking of the LEDs until the timeout occurs after 10 seconds
metadata.exclusion: Re-Inclusion and Exclusion are performed by pushing button 1 in management mode. Pushing all four buttons for 5 sec. turns the device into management mode (indicated by blinking green LED)
metadata.reset:
Use this procedure only if the primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable. 
(1) Turn the device into Management Mode by keeping all four buttons pushed for 5 seconds, (2) click on Button 3, (3) keep button 4 pushed for 4 seconds
